evaluation.scenario_name: Terminal: Start with pickup, then change to delive

scores.comments: The AI successfully completed the task by switching the order mode from pickup to delivery and confirmed the order with the customer. All requested items were added correctly, and the total cost was calculated accurately. The AI efficiently processed the order but initially misunderstood the customer's intent with 'Ù„Ùˆ Ø³Ù…Ø­Øª'. The Arabic used was natural and appropriate for the context, with a friendly and professional tone. Error handling was good, as the AI managed the switch from pickup to delivery smoothly, but it could have handled the initial misunderstanding more gracefully by asking for clarification instead of suggesting unrelated items.
